article_title: Gaza: Long campaign by Israel may follow war
sentence: It  has  involved  Israeli  strikes  that  have  killed  large  numbers  of  Palestinian  civilians.

article_title: Gaza: Long campaign by Israel may follow war
sentence: In  Israel,  the  families  of  the  hostages  still  held  in  Gaza  -  alive  or  dead  -  have  also  increasingly  denounced  Mr  Netanyahu  as  being  the  main  obstacle  in  the  way  of  securing  the  release  of  their  relatives.
